title: I didn't get my Pool Party icon ( I have a Pool Party Rek'Sai )
body: All my friends got the icon but I don't know why I didn't get it . Can anyone help please ?

replies.body:
Everything *should* be granted by today, June 27th. The only exception to this are the Mystery Champions, which will be sent out by July 1st. 

*As a friendly reminder in general, players who exhibited excessive negative behavior since February won’t unlock the Pool Party icon.*

In order to obtain the icon, you needed to participate in Team Up Week by winning a 5 man premade, or gifting another player.

Are you kidding me? Win a 5 man pre-made? Can't do that if I lack friends who are active. At least over half of mine were on vacation during the event and a few others haven't been on in awhile. And adding new ones isn't worth it if everyone I run into is toxic (excuse me for trying to fit into a healthier crowd). Clearly Riot didn't think this through. As for gifting, I would've if I got payed within the Event week, but I didn't so I couldn't gift any of my friends :[. Great, now I can't say I participated in the event if I don't have the icon. Should've just been able to win a game instead. So much easier/simpler. The odds were against me during this event...

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Gojulas,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=Q6zmxJAZ,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2015-06-27T20:24:13.236+0000)
>
> Are you kidding me? Win a 5 man pre-made? Can't do that if I lack friends who are active. At least over half of mine were on vacation during the event and a few others haven't been on in awhile. And adding new ones isn't worth it if everyone I run into is toxic (excuse me for trying to fit into a healthier crowd). Clearly Riot didn't think this through. As for gifting, I would've if I got payed within the Event week, but I didn't so I couldn't gift any of my friends :[. Great, now I can't say I participated in the event if I don't have the icon. Should've just been able to win a game instead. So much easier/simpler. The odds were against me during this event...

There were multiple boards threads and chatrooms open for random people to be a 5 man premade.

Except I don't use the Forums. Only time I use it is if I have problems. As for chat rooms I don't ever use those. My fault? Yes. I'm willing to accept that. But its still a forced 5 man pre-made team when it should've just been win 1 game. Maybe even do 3 or 5 wins to make it a bit more balanced to get.

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Gojulas,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=Q6zmxJAZ,comment-id=0003000000000000,timestamp=2015-06-27T22:15:30.585+0000)
>
> Except I don't use the Forums. Only time I use it is if I have problems. As for chat rooms I don't ever use those. My fault? Yes. I'm willing to accept that. But its still a forced 5 man pre-made team when it should've just been win 1 game. Maybe even do 3 or 5 wins to make it a bit more balanced to get.

im sorry that you cant read

it was very clearly stated on the pool party page but i guess you conveniently didnt read that part and now think its somehow riots fault for you not seeing it?

Ahhh the old "you can't read" insult. Stay classy Community. Anyways, I'm not gonna argue anymore. Over a stupid Icon (like you said in your other post). I'm just mad it HAD to be a 5 man pre-made. Great, now when I say I participated in the event (guess I got no points) to people they gonna be like "lol sure kid where's your icon?". Even though I did and just didn't get any points :[. All I hope is I'll maybe get a 2nd chance if there is another Pool Party Event and they bring back the Icon. I mean, they did that for 1 of the Christmas Icons (the sword one).

This event has been going around for a whole week and was announced even before. That is your problem for not looking or doing anythingy about it. Not Riots. People on Reddit and a lot of other social sites have been helping the community achieve the goals. Please do your research and look around the communnity. Riot set all of this up to encourage people to use the 5-man Queue. So don't blame Riot on something where you didn't even know about when clearly everyone else did

I'm not sure if you were talking to me or the thread, but I'm by no means blaming riot. I'm just saying how things ended up happening to me. I did do my research because when I found out about the icon I wanted to do whatever necessary to receive it. I am aware of the requirements to get it ( Win 5-man queue during team up week) I just posted in the hopes that someone would have an idea as to why this happened to me, I apologize if it came across in a childish manner.
He was talking to me. So, your good Boss. I'm just done arguing with these clowns. I hope you get your Icon though. Cause I sure ain't getting 1.

Meh, I gifted, won a 5 man and still didn't get mine. I guess I wasn't 100% positive to get the icon.. even tho I've been reporting people, getting false warning thrown against me, and generally trying to be a good player.. Guess Riot has too high of a standard.

> [{quoted}](name=Sythriel Draken,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=Q6zmxJAZ,comment-id=000300000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-06-28T03:06:14.318+0000)
>
> Meh, I gifted, won a 5 man and still didn't get mine. I guess I wasn't 100% positive to get the icon.. even tho I've been reporting people, getting false warning thrown against me, and generally trying to be a good player.. Guess Riot has too high of a standard.

icons dont mean shit anyway and 99% of the people who get it (like me) wont use it its really nothing to worry about
Except I'm a Zac main and wanted to go further and prove my devotion to all that is Zac :'( But all my friends got in and I didn't :/
I know how you feel man.
I also didn't get the icon. I won 2 pre-made games and have not been suspended banned or anything like that.
i know i contribued points and i don't think i been negative or anything, is there a way i can find out if i have been?
You'd have to ask Player Support to take a look into your account.

> [{quoted}](name=Wido508,realm=EUNE,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=Q6zmxJAZ,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-06-27T14:14:39.494+0000)
>
> All my friends got the icon but I don't know why I didn't get it . Can anyone help please ?
me too :C

Yeah... It's the 28th, I haven't been notified for any sort of bad behavior and I'm really sad because all of the friends I played with to contribute to Team Up and Pool Party have the icon but I don't. (To add insult to injury I love that icon to death because zac is prob my favorite champ and my friends are kind of meh about the icon) I wanted to wait and believe I would receive it later but I still haven't got it. :(
Does 5 man premade in  ARAM count?
Yup! :]

Question, I didn't the Pool Party Icon when I haven't been showing excessive negative behavior, except on off days but every one does that once in a while. The only thing could possibly explain why I could be showing "negative behavior" is my disconnects during games, but not everyone has decent or perfect running connection. :( I'd just like an explanation why I didn't get one in my case.

Hiya! 

AFAIK, they're being given out through today, the 27th, and it's possible it may take a bit longer, since so many players earned them. That said, LeaverBuster was one of the determining factors in the distribution of rewards. 

If you're curious about your account, you can submit a [ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=4584) to Player Support, and they'd be able to give you more info.
Thank you very much for replying, it is very appreciated :) Hope you had a great day Riot Katey
No worries. :D Take care!
It should. ARAM, SR, and Dominion all counted
i diddnt get :c
Did you ever earn a point for the event? You would have had to either win a 5 man premade game, or have gifted something to another player.
Uhm i participated, didnt get banned since february, always have been a good sport but still didnt receive my pool party icon. anyone knows why?? plz?

All rewards should be granted by the 27th.

So sometime today.
I also read the 1st of July so. Be patient.
